title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 622.6 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 622.6 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) When authorized by statute the director may request that the court award the
service a reasonable fee. (b) The director's requests for fees
for the services of attorneys shall not exceed the hourly rates of compensation
set forth in Judiciary Law section 35; and the director's requests for fees for
the services of non-lawyer professionals shall not exceed the hourly rate of
compensation set forth in the Unified Court System's compensation guidelines
for court-appointed non-lawyer professionals. (c) Fees awarded the service shall be
maintained and dispensed in accordance with law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
622.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
